title: FS: VARIOUS PCs INCLUDING COBB ROOKIE TEAM CARD
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: FS: VARIOUS PCs INCLUDING COBB ROOKIE TEAM CARD
posts.post_content:
Edited to reflect three sales.

Rare Dietsche Tigers team PC with a very early Cobb included.  This is the highest graded SGC version and is 1/1.  There are no PSA cards graded a 4. $2800 delivered.  PM or email if interested. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/NnUtYA][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/1867/30440297678_53073c7a2a_c.jpg[/img][/url]
Great postcards - and for those that aren't aware, that is lil' Rastus to the right of Cobb in the top postcard.  Great backstory on their relationship.  GLWS
Jeff, I'll take the Heimer, PM coming.
